summary: An ordinance accepting a deed dated May 20, 1911, from Maud Walthew McGilvra and Oliver C. McGilvra, of Seattle, Washington to the City of Seattle, a municipal corporation, to that part of block 5, Replat of John J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition to the City of Seattle, lying southerly from the south margin of Madison Street, on condition that the same is used for park purposes for the term of 15 years.
